sentences.en: He's so mingy with his money.
My godmother never gives me anything but a mingy ten shillings at Christmas.
sentences.cn: 我的教母除了在圣诞节很吝啬地给我十个先令外,什么也不给我.

sentences.en: My godmother never gives me anything but mingy ten shillings at Christmas.
sentences.cn: 我的教母除了在圣诞节很吝啬地给我十个先令外，什么也不给我。

sentences.en: This restaurant serves very mingy portions.
sentences.cn: 这家餐厅的饮食分量很少.

sentences.en: You're mingy to give me such a small piece of cake.
sentences.cn: 你真小气,就给我这么一小块蛋糕.

words.tran_cn: 吝啬的；卑鄙的；少得可怜的；卑贱的
